item.title: Recent write-up on LLMs and uncertainty
item.description: This quarter, the Computational Journalism lab undertook a little science comunication exercise: each of us wrote a short blogpost dissecting a recent research paper + its implications for news practitioners. Here’s the link to my post, published on the Generative AI in the Newsroom (GAIN) blog.
